title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python/JS bindings for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with GPU acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list and delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node.js, Deno and browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG and admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama providing synchronous/asynchronous APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API with ActiveModel-style interfaces.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI chat tool built on Node.js offering conversation history, markdown rendering and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local LLM code completion and chat sidebar powered by Ollama.

title: Ollama discussion on Hacker News
summary: Community thread comparing Ollama to llama.cpp, text-generation-webui and discussing GPU memory usage.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing how to build RAG pipelines with Ollama, LangChain and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with local Ollama models via slash commands and thread conversations.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: reddit/r/ollama
summary: Subreddit dedicated to Ollama: model recommendations, troubleshooting, benchmarks and showcase projects.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language wrapper for Ollama’s REST API with async/await and native JSON handling.

title: ollama-express
summary: Starter repo demonstrating how to build a TypeScript Express API that proxies and extends Ollama endpoints.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat application with multi-session support, model picker and conversation export to Markdown.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled AWS EC2 instances with Ollama server pre-installed.

title: ollama-go
summary: Unofficial Go client library for Ollama with context cancellation and structured generation helpers.
